greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of x such that x^x = Pi.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: x^x=Pi; solve(%,x); evalf(%, 140); # solution is log(Pi)/LambertW(log(Pi)), where LambertW is the Omega function.
results.author: James L. Dean (csvcjld(AT)nomvs.lsumc.edu)
ext: Better name from _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Dec 30 2014
